As a base coat: Apply before nail lacquer to prevent nail staining and ensure long-lasting nail lacquer.\n\nAs a top coat: Apply over nail lacquer for a fast-drying, high-gloss, protective shine.\n\nAs a nail strengthener: Apply every other day for strong, flexible nails that resist breaking. On natural nails apply two coats, followed by one coat every other day; remove weekly.
Warnings from packaging:
Caution: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid skin contact. Contains formaldehyde which has the potential to cause skin sensitization. Protect cuticles with grease or oil.,Flammable.
